attributes.action: Change the age of children’s railway tickets from 16 to 18 years old
attributes.background: As children now have to stay in education until they are 18 years old , children’s railway ticket prices need to reflect this

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require train operators to allow under 18s to purchase child tickets
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705193
